page.title: 07UNUSUAL PLACE NAMES.
page.content: In our block there are a lot of unusual place names.The main village is called Bellingham (pronounced Bellinjum)which comes from the family name de Bellingham who once held the castle here.Hesleyside (which is the manor house)gets its name as it stands on a hillside.It was built for the Charlton family who owned most of the land in this area at one time. Dunterley is a little hamlet which gets its name from the Celtic word "dintref" meaning village by the castle.We found the farm name Duckbutts to mean a field with short grass and an obstacle in the centre.Another strange name is the Reenes,which means long furrow-like strips of water to separate cattle and crops.
